title: Prysm CL shows `could not insert block ####### to fork choice store` error from time to time
body:
# üêû Bug Report

### Description

Prysm CL shows `could not insert block ####### to fork choice store` error from time to time

```
[2022-11-05 12:19:00]  INFO blockchain: Synced new block block=0xe2326c07... epoch=158402 finalizedEpoch=158400 finalizedRoot=0x9a09a590... slot=5068893
[2022-11-05 12:19:00]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=69 payloadHash=0x8ade9d918849 slot=5068893 syncBitsCount=0 txCount=76
[2022-11-05 12:19:13]  INFO blockchain: Synced new block block=0x8506ac32... epoch=158402 finalizedEpoch=158400 finalizedRoot=0x9a09a590... slot=5068894
[2022-11-05 12:19:13]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=128 payloadHash=0x25e038dfe810 slot=5068894 syncBitsCount=509 txCount=145
[2022-11-05 12:19:25]  INFO blockchain: Synced new block block=0x18d479a3... epoch=158402 finalizedEpoch=158400 finalizedRoot=0x9a09a590... slot=5068895
[2022-11-05 12:19:25]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=128 payloadHash=0xda3462c53143 slot=5068895 syncBitsCount=508 txCount=116
[2022-11-05 12:19:29]  INFO p2p: Peer summary activePeers=55 inbound=45 outbound=9
[2022-11-05 12:19:39]  INFO blockchain: Synced new block block=0x99925d4c... epoch=158403 finalizedEpoch=158401 finalizedRoot=0xa545b72a... slot=5068896
[2022-11-05 12:19:39]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=128 payloadHash=0xe11ab6e746f9 slot=5068896 syncBitsCount=507 txCount=172
[2022-11-05 12:20:29]  INFO p2p: Peer summary activePeers=55 inbound=45 outbound=9
[2022-11-05 12:20:48]  INFO state-gen: Saved state in DB root=9a09a590072d slot=5068800
[2022-11-05 12:20:48] ERROR sync: Could not handle p2p pubsub error=could not process block: could not insert block 5068897 to fork choice store: context deadline exceeded topic=/eth2/4a26c58b/beacon_block/ssz_snappy
[2022-11-05 12:20:48]  INFO blockchain: Synced new block block=0x6a1b1c93... epoch=158403 finalizedEpoch=158401 finalizedRoot=0xa545b72a... slot=5068897
[2022-11-05 12:20:48]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=117 payloadHash=0xf29267785857 slot=5068897 syncBitsCount=345 txCount=139
[2022-11-05 12:20:50]  INFO blockchain: Synced new block block=0x9d957b57... epoch=158403 finalizedEpoch=158401 finalizedRoot=0xa545b72a... slot=5068898
[2022-11-05 12:20:50]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=128 payloadHash=0x64ac06658e45 slot=5068898 syncBitsCount=460 txCount=126
[2022-11-05 12:20:57]  INFO blockchain: Called new payload with optimistic block payloadBlockHash=0xcc4e4ad32a88 slot=5068899
[2022-11-05 12:20:57]  INFO blockchain: Called fork choice updated with optimistic block finalizedPayloadBlockHash=0xbffff551f49e headPayloadBlockHash=0xcc4e4ad32a88 headSlot=5068899
[2022-11-05 12:20:57]  INFO blockchain: Synced new block block=0xc976c1b7... epoch=158403 finalizedEpoch=158401 finalizedRoot=0xa545b72a... slot=5068899
```

### Has this worked before in a previous version?

Didnt see such errors on previous versions

## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction

Run Nethermind + Prysm docker containers. Wait for error to appear in logs

Nethermind
```
sudo docker run -t -d \
-v /tmp/container_sockets:/tmp \
-v $HOME/nethermind:/var/lib/nethermind \
-v $HOME/jwtsecret:/var/lib/jwtsecret \
--network host \
--name nethermind nethermind/nethermind:latest \
--config mainnet \
--datadir /var/lib/nethermind \
--Sync.SnapSync true \
--Sync.AncientBodiesBarrier 11052984 \
--Sync.AncientReceiptsBarrier 11052984 \
--HealthChecks.Enabled true \
--JsonRpc.Enabled true \
--JsonRpc.EngineHost 0.0.0.0 \
--JsonRpc.EnginePort 8551 \
--JsonRpc.JwtSecretFile /var/lib/jwtsecret/jwt.hex \
--JsonRpc.AdditionalRpcUrls "http://localhost:8551|http;ws|net;eth;subscribe;engine;web3;client" \
--Network.ActivePeersMaxCount 100 \
--Merge.Enabled true
```

Prysm CL
```
sudo docker run -t -d \
-v $HOME/.eth2:/data \
-v $HOME/jwtsecret:/var/lib/jwtsecret \
--network host \
--name beacon-node gcr.io/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain:stable \
--mainnet \
--datadir=/data \
--rpc-host=0.0.0.0 \
--p2p-host-ip={VM_IP} \
--grpc-gateway-host=0.0.0.0 \
--execution-endpoint=http://127.0.0.1:8551 \
--jwt-secret=/var/lib/jwtsecret/jwt.hex \
--http-mev-relay=http://127.0.0.1:18550/ \
--suggested-fee-recipient=0xEad087dfBcAd3B48c9B05A9a4e3ff79C88d97340 \
--checkpoint-sync-url={INFURA_URL} \
--genesis-beacon-api-url={INFURA_URL} \
--grpc-gateway-corsdomain=http://0.0.0.0:7500,http://127.0.0.1:7500,http://localhost:7500 \
--accept-terms-of-use
```

## üî• Error

Logs for error at `[2022-11-04 02:12:54]`
```
[2022-11-04 02:11:13]  INFO blockchain: Synced new block block=0x8cadd689... epoch=158082 finalizedEpoch=158080 finalizedRoot=0x772816e8... slot=5058654

[
```

## üåç  Your Environment

Azure Hosted VM, Standard D8ds v4 (8 vcpus, 32 GiB memory, 2TB SSD)

**Operating System:**
Ubuntu 20

**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)**
Prysm v3.1.2

**Anything else relevant (validator index / public key)?**
No errors in Validator logs

Logs from Nethermind during error time in Prysm CL `[2022-11-05 12:20:48]`

